revised_title: Obituary of Johannes Wislicenus: A Pioneering Figure in Organic Chemistry
tldr: This obituary celebrates the life and work of Johannes Wislicenus, a prominent figure in the field of organic chemistry. Wislicenus made significant contributions to the understanding of isomerism and the role of fats and carbohydrates in muscular energy. His early life, marked by personal and political struggles, led him to become a dedicated scientist and academic. He held various positions in Swiss universities and made groundbreaking discoveries during his time in Zurich.
